snippet: Rescuers in eastern India searched for survivors on Tuesday after a ferry with more than 300 passengers capsized during a severe storm.
abstract: Rescuers in eastern India continue to search for survivors after an overcrowded ferry capsized during a storm; authorities estimate that at least 40 people have died and that up to 200 are still missing.

byline.original: By HARI KUMAR and SRUTHI GOTTIPATI

lead_paragraph: Rescuers in eastern India searched for survivors on Tuesday after a ferry with more than 300 passengers capsized during a severe storm.

headline.seo: Scores Missing in Fatal Ferry Sinking in India
headline.main: Scores Missing in Fatal Ferry Sinking in India
headline.print_headline: India: Search for Living Continues in Ferry Capsizing
